song.title: Demodays 2012 Invitation
song.info: [url]http://demodays.org[/url] Let me tell you a tale, the tale of the undone invitation. Demodays (as well as Buenzli) had an invitation every year - be it a demo, intro or even a game. This year, we didn't manage to bring a proper invitation to life. Nevertheless, we definitively want to set you into party mood right now: so here is an invitation tune ! See you all in a few days : )
